posting_body: ['The Felix', '11100 E Dartmouth Ave, Denver, CO, 80014', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 26', 'OR Text', '26', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'Welcome Home', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 810 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to The Felix Apartments, a beautiful community of studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments in Denver, CO.', 'Designed with comfort and convenience in mind, each of our homes include efficient appliances, large walk-in closets, private patios or balconies, cozy fireplaces, and state-of-the-art security systems.', 'Additional options such as newly upgraded interiors, wood-style plank flooring, technology packages, and private yards are also available in select homes.', 'When you step out to discover everything that our community has to offer, we think you will be quite pleased with our array of fun and convenient amenities.', 'We offer a fitness center, racquetball and basketball court, a swimming pool, clubhouse with media and recreation rooms, and a business center.', 'Resident services are also in abundance and include off-street parking, on-site maintenance and management, laundry facilities, and package receiving.', 'With a playground for outdoor fun, and a pet park for your four-legged friend, we truly have something for everyone!', 'Surrounding our beautiful community, you will find a plethora of shopping, dining, and entertainment options to explore.', 'Just across the way is Cherry Creek Park which is a favorite locale of outdoor enthusiasts, offering camping, hiking, boating, horseback riding, archery, and an off-leash dog park.', 'Another benefit to residing in our one-bedroom apartments in Denver is easy access to public transportation, as well as interstates and highways, making it easy to get to Downtown and everything else wonderful that the surrounding mountains, forests, and cities have to offer.', 'It’s time that you experienced the best in residential living by coming home to The Felix Apartments.', 'Call today to schedule your tour!', 'Features', '- Wood-burning Fireplace*', '- Stainless Steel
